title: High Efficiency, Front Loading Full Size Washer and Dryer, Rooftop BBQ
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 728 Sq.
Batik is home in harmony with community, nature and neighborhood.
A dynamic part of the new Yesler, bringing together all walks of life for work, life and play.
Located on the new streetcar line, Batik is minutes to downtown, Pioneer Square and Capitol Hill.

Home to a future 1.8-acre central park, three pocket parks, a half-mile green loop and dedicated city gardens, Yesler feels less like high-rise city living, and more like a friendly, down-to-earth neighborhood.
Soon to be yours to call home.

Balconies and Patios*, Stainless Steel Appliance Package, Custom Roller Shade Window Coverings, Stainless Steel Appliances, Puget Sound views*, Hard-Surface Flooring, Large Soaking Tubs, High Efficiency, Front Loading Full Size Washer and Dryer, Walk-In Closets*, Quartz Countertops, Built in Pantries, A/C*, Mt. Rainier and City views*
Community Kitchen, Resident Lounge, Rooftop BBQ, Dog Run/Pet Friendly, Fitness Center
Use this link for more information:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
